scripts.dev: bun run db:sync && bun run --watch src/index.ts
scripts.db:drop-logs: psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "DO $$ DECLARE r record; BEGIN FOR r IN SELECT tablename FROM pg_tables WHERE schemaname='public' AND tablename LIKE 'logs%' LOOP EXECUTE format('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS %I.%I CASCADE', 'public', r.tablename); END LOOP; END $$;"
scripts.db:drop-log-groups: psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public.log_groups CASCADE"
